picked_headlines.summary: Fractional-bit quantizers optimize LLM deployment on edge devices.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article presents a significant advancement in deploying LLMs on edge devices, crucial for engineers and product developers focusing on resource optimization.

picked_headlines.summary: RAG systems evaluated for real-world applications, revealing key insights.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article provides practical insights into the design and evaluation of RAG systems, offering valuable information for both technical and managerial stakeholders interested in real-world AI applications.

digest:
- *LEMUR Neural Network Dataset* enhances AutoML with standardized models, improving evaluation and optimization. Read more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10552
- *ShinkaEvolve* uses LLMs for efficient program evolution, boosting scientific discovery. More details: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19349
- *STAF* automates security test generation from attack trees, enhancing automotive security testing. Explore here: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.20190
- *White-Basilisk* detects code vulnerabilities with a hybrid model, outperforming larger counterparts. Check it out: https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.08540
- *CANDLE* integrates LLMs for interpretable sarcopenia diagnosis, improving clinical decision-making. Learn more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.21179
- *EditVerse* unifies image and video editing, enhancing cross-modal learning. Discover more: https://huggingface.co/papers/2509.20360
- *MediNotes* automates medical note creation, reducing physician burnout. Read further: https://arxiv.org/abs/2410.01841
- *CSIYOLO* enhances scatter sensing in ISAC systems, ideal for existing setups. Details here: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19335
- *OmniFed* offers a modular framework for federated learning, enhancing privacy and deployment. More info: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19396
- *FragAtlas-62M* advances drug discovery with novel chemical fragments. Explore: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19586
